message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $12,000 is a bit too high for me.  Would you consider $6,000?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $6,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $10,000.  I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring you.
Hi Alice, I understand the value, but $10,000 is still a little above my budget.  Could we meet in the middle at $8,000?
